text: rootiialis-/Documents /CTF/HTE/Machine/Obscurity/robert# python3 SuperSecureCrypt.py -h usage: SuperSecureCrypt.py [-h] [-i InFile] [-o OutFile] [-k Key] [-d] Encrypt with Obscura's encryption algorithm optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -i Infile The file to read -0 OutFile Where to output the encrypted/decrypted file -k Key Key to use -d Decrypt mode o0t~ /Documents/CTE/HTB/Machine/Obscurity/robert# python3 SuperSecureCrypt.py -d -i passwordreminder.txt -k ale -0 pud.txt HUBHRR RO AR AR # BEGINNING # # SUPER SECURE ENCRYPTOR # RO RO AR T B FILE MODE # AR AR AR AR Opening file passwordreminder.txt... Decrypting. .. Writing to pwd.txt... rootikaliz~/Documents/CTF/HTB/Machine/Obscurity/robert# cat pwd.txt s
